CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Low-band-gap polymers for bulk - heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) have been studied intensively with the aim of matching a greater part of the solar spectrum and thus harvesting more photon flux , to produce efficiencies greater than 7-9 % .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Low-band-gap polymers |
| Bulk-heterojunction (BHJ)-type polymer solar cells (PSCs) |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Bulk-heterojunction (BHJ) type polymer solar cells (PSCs) |
